abstract: Adrianus de Kroon, husband of Fabiola Bittar de Kroon, only fatality in commuter train accident in Hoboken, NJ, describes his struggles in telling their two-year-old daughter about her mother's death.

byline.original: By FERNANDA SANTOS and ELI ROSENBERG

lead_paragraph: Adrianus de Kroon and his family had moved to Hoboken, N.J., from Brazil not long ago. On Thursday, his wife was killed when a train crash caused a portion of the station’s ceiling to collapse, officials said.

headline.main: Husband of Hoboken Crash Victim Struggles to Tell Their Child
headline.print_headline: Husband of Crash Victim Struggles to Tell Their Child
